text: Mattel is an American multinational toy company. It was founded in 1945. The company makes products and brands, like American Girl dolls, Barbie dolls, Fisher-Price toys, Thomas & Friends trains and Hot Wheels toys. In 2014, it ranked #403 on the Fortune 500 list. It is the largest toy maker in terms of revenue. ==Toys== *Talking SpongeBob *Talking Patrick *Talking Squidward *Squirting SpongeBob *Babbling SpongeBob *Beach Blastin SpongeBob *Eye-Poppin SpongeBob *Pants-Droppin SpongeBob *Barbie Loves SpongeBob ==References== Category:Companies based in California Category:1945 establishments in the United States Category:Toy companies Category:Manufacturing companies of the United States
title: Mattel
